my_data.title: The playground is there for you to step up
my_data.description: 1 - The playground is there for you to step up, and there is a range of weapons to choose from here for destruction. Even if it is a rocket launcher, you are free to use it, and it will make you pressured to see things explode. So, don’t just explode your anger on another. Instead, here is your game to be tested with the best platform to unleash all your pressures.So, with this beginner guide, let’s learn everything you need to focus on for the game and that will give you an easy start for the game. This guide will help you realize how your gameplay should be carried out with various recommendations. Let’s get started with Melon Playground on PC, and here is your beginner guide.

my_data.title: 2 - Choosing a Map in Melon Playground
my_data.description: When you have first entered the game as a Melon Playground beginner, you will be given the option to choose your map. This means that you can have a selection for your interface for gaming. There will be several options provided here to be selected by a player, and choose whatever map you like and then set it for destruction.

my_data.title: 3 - Connecting anything with a Rope
my_data.description: The next thing that we are going to talk about under this Melon Playground beginner guide is all about how you are going to connect things. We are going to use a rope here, and let us guide you on how you will connect anything in the game with this rope.There is a range of ropes available in the game, and pressing the star-like icon on your screen will allow you to select one of them. There will be different types of ropes there, and you can select one as per your wish. And then tapping from one side to another will allow you to connect anything you want to do, and you are just free to smash things with this rope by making it rotate from side to side with pleasure.

my_data.title: 4 - Guide for Holding an Item
my_data.description: Suppose there is a living in the game, and you, as a Melon Playground beginner, want to make him hold an item. So, if you are just starting the game, the lack of knowledge will make you do nothing and feel struggled here. But let us just explain the process.The first step is to get into the item you want to hold by stepping into the menu. Whether it is a knife, a spear, a sword, a hammer, or anything, you can pick one, and after you have selected an item, you can grab the living’s hand. Then, you need to press the icon that seems like a switch from your screen, and it will allow you to grab your item. And now, if you want to just kill someone with the item you got, you are just free to do it here. Pure satisfaction will be there for you all.

my_data.title: 5 - Saving the Builds in Melon Playground
my_data.description: The next thing you must learn as a Melon Playground beginner is how you will save your builds. For this, you can hold your screen for over 3 seconds, and then you will be allowed to select your build. After this, you can double tap from any part of the build where it will pop up a drop-down menu for you.You can scroll down from this menu until you have given an option to save a name for the Contraption and give it a name and then save. Then your build will be saved. If you want to delete it, you can do the same steps from the menu and select the delete option. You can place as many builds as you want for the screen right after you have saved your builds.

my_data.title: 6 - Making a Gun Fire without Holding the Gun
my_data.description: For the next part of this Melon Playground beginner guide, we are going to teach you another bizarre thing about the gameplay. It is about making gunfire without actually holding it from your hands. To do this, you can have a double tap from your gun, and then there will be a menu that comes with a list of options. Scroll down until there is the toggle and tap it to have gunfire without actually holding it by your hand. Then you are just free to have gunfire and make utter destruction as per your wish.

my_data.title: 7 - Melon Playground Beginner Guide for Walking
my_data.description: Just like the other options from this game, if you want your living to walk from the screen, you need to double tap on the screen to pop up a menu with the list. A list of options are here displayed to be chosen from.  You can go down from it until you make it to the walk option. By doing so, your living is going to talk from the screen.When the living starts to walk, you can just unleash your bizarre mind with the cruel thoughts of riding a vehicle towards him, and then it will hit him.

my_data.title: 8 - Sitting a Living
my_data.description: Since we have so many things to do with the living from our screen, we can just try to make him sit as well. To make it happen, you as a player can go to the menu option and then select a chair to get it. To make your living sit down from the chair, you can double tap on your living to pop up a menu with a list of choices. You can choose to sit, walk, and do many things here; since we need him to sit now, you just choose the sit option.But if you change your mind and then you don’t want him to sit anymore, have a double tap again. Pressing on the option for stopping the animation will allow you to make him sit again.

my_data.title: 9 - Resizing an Item
my_data.description: As the last thing to take under this Melon Playground beginner guide, let’s learn how you can resize your items. Sometimes, it may not feel like you have the right size for your weapons, and keeping it a small size will not satisfy the destruction you are meant to do in the game. In such cases, you can resize the items the way you want them to be.You can double tap on the item or the weapon here, and same as the above options we described, the game will show you a menu. From this menu, you can choose the option that is set for the Size, and selecting it will make you resize the items you want.
